select a.FileListID, a.ArchiveID, a.SingleProjectID, a.RootPath, a.PDFFilePath, a.OrderIndex,
a.OrderIndex as archFileNo, a.BH as fileNo, a.zrr as responsibility, a.Title as fileTitle, a.bz as archFileNote, (CASE WHEN a.StartTime='' THEN '' ELSE convert(varchar(10),a.StartTime,23) end) as createdStart, '' as createdEnd, a.w_t_h as fileImageNo, '' as pageNo, (case when cast(b.ajlx as int)=183 then a.ManualCount else '' end)as textNums, (case when cast(b.ajlx as int)=184 then a.ManualCount else '' end)as drawingNums, (case when cast(b.ajlx as int)=185 then a.ManualCount else '' end)as phoneNums, '' as note, a.ztlx as mediaTypeCode, '永久' as storageTypeCode, '秘密' as securityLevelCode, a.wjgbdm as manuscriptCode, a.gg as specCode, '30年' as storagePeriodCode, 'true' as scanFlag from T_FileList a inner join T_Archive b on a.ArchiveID=b.ArchiveID where 1=1 {0} order by a.OrderIndex asc
